channel.title: §§§~~~bandos scape v3~~~§§§
channel.description:
this has...
full fighting pits 85% full veng most weapon and armor have right bonuses auto cast muli-hit barrage full 100% normal magic 96% full ancients old staff zone fixed mage bank glitch...now you don't log out you tele home and then just tele to mage bank and loot your shit if your luck no nub looted it already and much more
things to look for in v4!
full ancients 80% lunar full fishing and cooking full fletching full wcing full fletch full c wars 90% duel arena 80% fist of guthix 90% zam sword [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/zamsword2.jpg[/img] and full sara sword and much more
i have a few pics...
[IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/Ricscape0000.png[/img] [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/Ricscape0003.png[/img] [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/Ricscape0001.png[/img] [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/Ricscape0004.png[/img] [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/evolved0006.png[/img] [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/Ricscape0002.png[/img] [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/newveng.jpg[/img] scan... [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/virusscan2.jpg[/img]
download: http://uppit.com/XTWKRS more dl links coming soon...
credits: 80% me for fixing most glitches and adding stuff [IMG]http://i260.photobucket.com/albums/ii31/masterpkXD/myvisittoroom6XD.jpg[/img]
and i tank j3ws i for the great base!
[quote="mylust4blood"][img]http://wildyscape.biz/uploads/image/U4180-1218962700.jpg[/img] can't download a source or client because of a bad file share well here you go
--------------------------note------------------------------------------- i don't own these servers im just uploading for community
summon-pkz client (credits to primadude) http://rapidshare.com/files/137924527/Summon-Pkz_Client_Version5.rar.html
figment all checked and working V1 http://uppit.com/H8UNHX V2 http://uppit.com/FSIDNN V3 http://uppit.com/SBGY2M V3.5 http://uppit.com/MSEBIJ V4 http://uppit.com/BLTU1M http://uppit.com/BLTU1M v4.5 http://uppit.com/O7DXZ6 http://files.filefront.com/Figmentscaperar/;11513461;/fileinfo.html (thanks masta killa)
pestcontrol server by: alomvattende/phonix/sqaud http://uppit.com/5CEYSZ
rev scape (unedited bandos scape by deforced' on the silabsoft forums but they work good together) Server Download - http://uppit.com/KI7B9F Client Download - http://uppit.com/UDB4Y1
well thats it for now im tired and bout to go to bed but if u want another souce or client up here reply to this and i will upload it!
-mylust4blood
ps. for you noobs that can't scan ur self every server and file you download has viruses get over it you should just be worry bout mal viruses[/quote]
